title: Carol Twombly?
content:
Does anyone here know how to contact Carol Twombly? Please email me directly with the info if you don't want it posted in the open.   
   
Thanks,   
Cheshire
author: cheshiredave

comments.content:
When you get in touch with her, please ask her how she did that killer seeing-eye mental teleport trick, all the way to Rome. She made Trajan with no sources (I mean "officially"), and no visit to the column itself either...   
   
hhp

If it were me, I'd say "I column as I see 'em." But then, I'm not her.   
   
(Sorry. So, so sorry.)
